title: 96/241/Euratom, ECSC: Commission Decision of 12 March 1996 on the conclusion on behalf of the European Coal and Steel Community and the European Atomic Energy Community of the Interim Agreement between the European Community, the European Coal and Steel Community and the European Atomic Energy Community, of the one part, and the Republic of Moldova, of the other, on trade and trade-related matters
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 12 March 1996 on the conclusion on behalf of the European Coal and Steel Community and the European Atomic Energy Community of the Interim Agreement between the European Community, the European Coal and Steel Community and the European Atomic Energy Community, of the one part, and the Republic of Moldova, of the other, on trade and trade-related matters (96/241/Euratom, ECSC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The Interim Agreement between the European Community, the European Coal and Steel Community and the European Atomic Energy Community, of the one part, and the Republic of Moldova, of the other part, on trade and trade-related matters, together with the Protocol and the declarations, are hereby approved on behalf of the European Coal and Steel Community and the European Atomic Energy Community.
These texts are attached to this Decision (1).

The President of the Commission shall give the notification provided for in Article 35 of the Interim Agreement on behalf of the European Coal and Steel Community and the European Atomic Energy Committee.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 March 1996.
For the Commission
Hans VAN DEN BROEK
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 40, 17. 2. 1996, pp. 11 and 40.
